text: �So be forgiving with gracious forgiveness.He [Abū Bakr al-Sijzī] said, �Muḥammad b. Ḥanafiyya related from ʿAlī  that regarding His words, So be forgiving with gracious forgiveness, he said: �It is contentment (riḍā) without reproval (ʿitāb).�� And Sahl said:[One should be] without resentment (ḥiqd) or censure (tawbīkh) after forgiving someone; this is to overlook [someone�s misdeeds] graciously (iʿrāḍ jamīl).His words, Exalted is He:
